ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Invis: who cares, Regain focus.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... In fact my cat will tackle the rear two speaker stands (Four Point Surround Speakers).  Those little three legged tripods are no match for a kitten, she
ygData.messageBody:
> > Those dogs make me want to turn off 3D Audio ;-) My cat goes nuts.
>
> DOH! I'm allergic to cats! To quote one of my son's favorite books... "Go
> dog go!"

In fact my cat will tackle the rear two speaker stands (Four Point
Surround Speakers). Those little three legged tripods are no
match for a kitten, she sweeps out a leg and then chews on the
wires. Side note: It's hard to code in the day with bandaids
on my fingers from scratches. Guess she got me back for almost
shutting her paw in the door the other day. It was the worst,
bloodcurdling scream I'd ever heard from an animal that small.
No damage done, and I even gave her some treats - although she
still scratched me up... women.

Harmonic.
